name: Cryptbloom

passives.name: Life From Death
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova that radiates from the location of their death over {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|heal|healing}} you and allied champions hit for 100 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}.

effects_structured.raw: Scoring a {{tip takedown}} against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova that radiates from the location of their death over {{fd 1.75}} seconds, {{tip heal healing}} you and allied champions hit for 100 {{as (+ 20% AP)}}.

simpleDescription: Activate to remove all debuffs and grant massive Move Speed

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
